content.html: I can't believe a feature that I suggested randomly as a response to Daniel Stenberg poll is now part of curl (since 7.82.0). It's now possible to use curl --json which is equivalent to curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d. Thanks @bagder
content.value: I can't believe a feature that I suggested randomly as a response to Daniel Stenberg poll is now part of curl (since 7.82.0). It's now possible to use curl --json which is equivalent to curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d. Thanks @bagder
